Just realized I forgot about 'my leader'!

::Zardus/DevilDuer/Havok::

Zardus walks out of the Iron Fist, aiming his plasma launcher and 
firing three shots at Prebon.

Flying above him, Havoc fires two missiles at Bullet.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer nods. "Sure thing, he's also at the battle though."

He powers up the thursters that were on the soles of the feet of the 
suit and begins to move through the water.

"Follow me, I'll get ya to base."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Big fish" <Bigfish1011@h...> wrote:
> :::Bigfish:::
> 
> He reachs out and shakes DevilDuer's hand. Bigfish chuckled at 
DevilDuer 
> question. "Yes, i can swim very fast. But can we first go talk to 
your 
> leader?"
